javafe.filespace
Class LeafTree

java.lang.Object
  javafe.filespace.Tree
      javafe.filespace.LeafTree

 class LeafTree
extends Tree

A LeafTree is a degenerate form of Tree that never contains children. It is used for the leaf nodes of a Tree.
